GameConditionDef.label: Strange fog
GameConditionDef.description: A dense cloud of fog is moving across this entire region. Any living thing not under a roof will be affected, and items left outside will corrode.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a cloud of suffocating purple mist will blanket the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], affecting outdoor plants and animal life
GameConditionDef.letterText:
A new species of plants is trying to change this planets atmosphere to something else. A plume of fog is rolling over this entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will be affected by the fog.

It will last for anywhere between a few days to over a quadrum.

GameConditionDef.label: Suffocating fog
GameConditionDef.description: A suffocating cloud of toxic spores from some distant source is settling over this entire region. Any living thing not under a roof will quickly be poisoned, and items left outside will corrode.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a cloud of suffocating toxic spores will blanket the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], infecting any animals or people outside.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The suffocating purple mist has dissappered.
GameConditionDef.letterText:
An alien like species is trying to change this planets atmosphere to one it can better thrive in. It has released aplume of spores over this entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will be slowly sickened by the toxic spores.

It will last for anywhere between a few days to over a quadrum.
